CustomField.formula:
(X1st_Meal_End_Hour__c + CASE(TEXT(X1st_Meal_End_Minutes__c ), "0", 0, "00", 0, "15", 0.25, "30", 0.5, "45", 0.75, 0 ) + IF(TEXT(X1st_Meal_End_AM_PM__c)="PM", 12, 0) ) -
(X1st_Meal_Start_Hour__c + CASE(TEXT( X1st_Meal_Start_Minutes__c ), "0", 0, "00", 0, "15", 0.25, "30", 0.5, "45", 0.75, 0 ) + IF( TEXT( X1st_Meal_Start_AM_PM__c ) = "PM", 12, 0) )
CustomField.label: 1st Meal Calcuation
